name: GuruHotel, Inc
description: Developer of e-commerce hotel platform designed to create a link between technology and hotel experts. The company's software allows hotels to create and launch an official hotel website in minutes, connect their inventory, start selling their rooms with multiple payment options and connect with distribution apps, enabling hotel operators to instantly sell and receive reservations and have higher occupancy levels.
one_liner: Developer of e-commerce hotel platform designed to create a link between technology and hotel experts. The company's software allows hotels to create and launch an official hotel website in minutes, connect their inventory, start selling their rooms with multiple payment options and connect with distribution apps, enabling hotel operators to instantly sell and receive reservations and have higher occupancy levels.
